verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is my shepherd <S%H7462><s%>; I shall not want <S%H2637><s%>.
He maketh me to lie down <S%H7257><s%> in green <S%H1877><s%> pastures <S%H4999><s%>; He leadeth <S%H5095><s%> me beside still <S%H4496><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.
He restoreth <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: He guideth <S%H5148><s%> me in the paths <S%H4570><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> for his name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake.

Yea <S%H3212><s%>, thou I walk through the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, I will fear <S%H3372><s%> no evil <S%H7451><s%>; for thou art with me <S%H7626><s%>; Thy rod and thy staff <S%H4938><s%>, they comfort me <S%H5162><s%>.

Thou preparest <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the presence of mine enemies <S%H6887><s%>: Thou hast anointed <S%H1878><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; My cup <S%H3563><s%> runneth over <S%H7310><s%>.

Surely goodness <S%H2896><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> shall follow <S%H7291><s%> me all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>; And I shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H753><s%>.
